basics.name: Tina Vo
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Marketing in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

education.institution: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Learned social media marketing strategies and practices to help grow a gastroenterologist’s private practice
Co-authored blog posts related to various gastrointestinal and digestive system issues
Made calls to HR directors and gastroenterologists regarding the Colorectal Cancer Provider Outreach Program (CRCPOP)
Developed new communication strategies for sharing content with members
Created a pitch deck using PowerPoint to target university students in Ontario
Shared ideas with students and the Toronto Chapter board members
